response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to you, and we believe it could greatly enhance your business or personal endeavors. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $900,000, which we believe is a fair and advantageous proposition. We understand the importance of making the right investment decisions, and we are confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
